features: Larger 2 in 1 Remote Control Car: This toys RC cars is combined with transform car and robot, which has larger size than other transform cars and can transform from car to robot back and forth fluently with One-Click Deformation, bringing great fun to your kids.

Remote Control Car with Cool Lights: Equipped with dual cool led headlights, this transform RC cars is cool and beautiful both in day and night, which is a great gift for boys girls age 4-7 8-12, also an ideal gift for kids’ birthday, Christmas, holidays or other festivals.

Fantastic Design Remote Control Car: with a flexible drifting wheel design on the bottom, this toy RC cars can finish 360 degree rotation flexibly in both car and robot, and kids also can enjoy great fun with auto demonstration function.

Powerful 2.4Ghz Remote Control RC Cars: This remote control car is easy to control with 2.4Ghz remote control, which max up to 98 feet long distance control, and kids can enjoy great fun with friends without mutual interference.

Safe and Durable RC Cars: This remote control toy car is made of sturdy and safe ABS materials, which has passed strict CPSC, CPSIA quality inspection, ensuing your kids have a happy entertainment with friends and you can contact us anytime for any quality issue, we will be happy to provide help for you.
body.description: Warm Tips: 1.Please prepare 5*1.5 V AA batteries to operate this transform car before playing. 2.Kids should under adult supervision for safety when having fun with this remote control car. 3.It's better to take out the batteries when the car not in use for a long time. 4.This toy car is mainly suitable for indoor smooth floor, not suitable for outdoor grassland, stone roads or other rugged roads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fantastic Design Transform Robot Car One-Click Deformation With one-click deformation function, this 2 in 1 remote control car can easily transform from car to robot back and forth fluently, which can bring great entertainment for your kids. 360 Degree Rotation With a flexible drifting wheel design on the bottom, this transform rc cars can easily finish 360 degree rotation drifting both in car and robot , which is amazing and fun for kids. 2.4Ghz Remote Control With powerful 2.4Ghz remote control, this toy car can control max up to 98 feet, and chidlren can enjoy great fun together without worrying about mutual interference.

Warm Tips: 1.Please prepare 5*1.5 V AA batteries to operate this transform car before playing. 2.Kids should under adult supervision for safety when having fun with this remote control car. 3.It's better to take out the batteries when the car not in use for a long time. 4.This toy car is mainly suitable for indoor smooth floor, not suitable for outdoor grassland, stone roads or other rugged roads. Package included Remote Control Car*1 Remote Controller*1 User Manual*1 Screwdriver*1

Euuipped with cool dual led headlights, this remote control car is beautiful and cool both in the day and night, which is a great gift for boys girls age 4-7 8-12, also suitable for Christmas, birthday or other festivals gifts. This transform rc cars is fantastic designed with dual headlights, 360° rotation wheel, anti-skid tires, sturdy materials, one-click deformation, auto demonstration, bringing children happy entertainment in childhood. This transform remote control car is made of safe and durable ABS materials, which has passed strict CPSC, CPSIA quality testing, which is safe for kids to enjoy great fun with their friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandkids love this toy. Well engineered and easy for a three year old to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my nephew and as a little nervous. Pleasantly surprised. It works great and kept a pretty long charge. It transforms well and will steer in both modes. Would definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome gift for 3 year old boy
reviews.reviewText: Besides the fact of the quick delivery I purchased this as a birthday gift for my 3 year old nephew and he absolutely loved it. Great toy and great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: They are in perfect size for toddlers. My 2.5 years old son loved it. It’s easy for him to “transform” it back to a normal truck which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fun little transformer that transforms while it drives. Kid loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids loved it
reviews.reviewText: I got it for my nephew for the Christmas party. And all the kids love it from ages 2 to 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my younger brother for Christmas, took it out to play with it to make sure it worked. And while the car works and runs how it’s supposed to, the transform feature does not. The button for the transforming just isn’t working, which is sad because he wanted a transformer and not just a remote control car. If you’re getting this as a gift I would definitely test it out first to make sure all the features are working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 6 year old grandson loved this gift. We were all fascinated by how it transforms and does this little show for us. Along with it being a remote controlled car was a hit gift!
